description: The Love Letter cocktail is perfect for any romantic occasion! It has the perfect balance of sweetness and spice, making it ideal for&nbsp;Valentine's Day or any other special occasion. It's made with bourbon, orange liqueur, bitters, and citrus—it’s also garnished with a cherry.If you're looking for a special cocktail to share with your loved one or on any special day, look no further than the Love Letter!
name: Love Letter
